subject: svn commit: samba r23676 - in branches/SAMBA_4_0: .
body:
Author: kai
Date: 2007-07-03 06:20:00 +0000 (Tue, 03 Jul 2007)
New Revision: 23676

WebSVN: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba&rev=23676

Log:
Added a .gitignore file to hide generated files from git status.
It's identical to .bzrignore

Added:
   branches/SAMBA_4_0/.gitignore


Changeset:
Added: branches/SAMBA_4_0/.gitignore
===================================================================
--- branches/SAMBA_4_0/.gitignore	2007-07-03 06:17:39 UTC (rev 23675)
